user.title: go-eCharger Setup
user.description: If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://github.com/cathiele/homeassistant-goecharger

data.host: Hostname or IP-Address in the local network
data.name: uniq name of the charger
data.correction_factor: correction Factor for incorrect Voltage measurement

set_max_current.name: Set max current
set_max_current.description: Sets the maximum current in Ampere of the Charger.

charger_name.name: Charger name
charger_name.description: name of the charger to update (if not specified all chargers will be changed)

set_cable_lock_mode.name: Set cable lock mode
set_cable_lock_mode.description: Sets the cable lock mode of the Charger.

charger_name.name: Charger name
charger_name.description: name of the charger to update (if not specified all chargers will be changed)

cable_lock_mode.name: Cable lock mode
cable_lock_mode.description: lock mode for the cable connected to the charger (0=locked while car connected, 1=unlock after charging finished, 2=always locked)

set_absolute_max_current.name: Set absolute max current
set_absolute_max_current.description: Sets the absolute maximum current in Ampere of the Charger.

charger_name.name: Charger name
charger_name.description: name of the charger to update (if not specified all chargers will be changed)

charger_absolute_max_current.name: absolute max charge current
charger_absolute_max_current.description: absolute maximum current to be set (6-32)

set_charge_limit.name: Set charge limit
set_charge_limit.description: Sets the charge limit in kWh of the Charger.

charger_name.name: Charger name
charger_name.description: name of the charger to update (if not specified all chargers will be changed)
